hook_text: Sequence Express: Baby dragon conductor, destination LIMIT?

style_decision.reasoning: The prompt explicitly mentions 'Family Guy style,' which is a well-established cartoon aesthetic. A vibrant color palette will enhance the playful and engaging nature of the animation, appealing to a general audience on Instagram who are drawn to visually stimulating content. The 'baby dragon' and 'number train' elements also lend themselves perfectly to a cartoon style.

positioning_decision.reasoning: The content is a narrative with dialogue. Placing the text in the bottom center of the screen allows for good visibility of the characters and action while keeping the text accessible and easy to read for a broad audience on Instagram. This position also avoids the bottom 20% as per the rules for Instagram.
